titleInfo.title: Letter, J. Crozier Ramsey in Nashville, Tenn., to M.B.C. Ramsey in Charlotte, N.C. 1865 Aug. 11

mods.abstract: 1865 Aug. 11 J. Crozier Ramsey, Nashville, Tenn., to his mother, M.B.C. Ramsey, Charlotte, N.C. News of his father's brother, William B.A. Ramsey, and of his family with whom Crozier is living. Tells of a visit with McNutt, formerly a Federal officer and relays McNutt's impressions that Knoxvillians would welcome the Ramseys with the exception of Robert. Urges his family to return to Knoxville so that they can be near their grandchildren and have a better chance of recovering their property. Mention of other Confederate sympathizers returning to East Tennessee.
